description: Verification Order required to confirm the numbering and description of the residential and commercial units with a shared communal access and post point fronting Palace Green, following internal and external alterations to main property at all levels and redevelopment of north and southwest annexes, linked to Planning application PP/22/04490, as follows:Main BuildingConcierge Office, Ground Floor, 1 Palace Green, LONDON W8 4QAFlat 1, Ground/Lower Ground Floor, 1 Palace Green, LONDON, W8 4QAFlat 2, First Floor, 1 Palace Green, LONDON, W8 4QAFlat 3, Second Floor, 1 Palace Green, LONDON, W8 4QAFlat 4, Third and Fourth Floor, 1 Palace Green, LONDON, W8 4QAFlat 5, Lower Ground Floor, 1 Palace Green, LONDON, W8 4QAAnnexCoach House, Lower Ground/Ground/First Floors, 1 Palace Green, LONDON, W8 4QA The following addresses to be deleted:Garage Flat, First Floor, 1 Palace Green, LONDON, W8 4QA (Annex)  Porter's Lodge, Ground Floor, 1 Palace Green, LONDON, W8 4QA (Main Building)
